message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, based on our understanding of your needs and preferences. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire it at a special price tailored to ensure mutual satisfaction. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,150,000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing the value for you and securing a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
